Name: Power-up
Description: Signal sent when powering up or resetting the controller

Name: Tdistance
Description: The distance of the train from the gate in meters

Name: Tapproaching
Description: A train is approaching the gate area

Name: Tin
Description: A train is into the gate area

Name: Tleave
Description: A train is leaving the gate area

Name: Gopen
Description: Gate status (gate is open when true)
